name: Amazon Jungle Jump
description:
Game set on the amazon jungle, a scientist has come to collect ancient relics of the jungle. Collect the 3 relics while evading the jungle's guardians!

I couldn't get the starting page to be the first think you see, so after the first level it'll pop up and tell you how to play the game so I'll tell you how to play it. 

Crouch: Down Arrow

Jump Right: Up Arrow, Right arrow

Jump Left: Up Arrow, Left Arrow

Collect 3 relics to open the door

Avoid the purple portal.

After the second level the game will freeze thats how you know you've won.
